details:
noun
- an unforeseen obstacle
= synonyms: rub
- an opening made forcibly as by pulling apart
= synonyms: tear
- a dead tree that is still standing, usually in an undisturbed forest
= example: a dead tree that is still standing, usually in an undisturbed forest
- a sharp protuberance
verb
- hew jaggedly
- catch on a snag
= example: catch on a snag
- get by acting quickly and smartly
= example: get by acting quickly and smartly
